metadata.title: NIST SP 800-171A Revision 2 — Assessment Procedures for Security Requirements
metadata.remarks: NIST SP 800-171A Rev 2 - Simplified format with required control statements. Each control includes a statement part (required by OSCAL schema) along with assessment objectives and guidance. Control statements are derived from control titles. This version is OSCAL-compliant with all non-standard properties removed.
